welcome_message_body: "Welcome to George Mason, where the charm of small-town America meets the excitement of a bustling city. Known for its rich history, vibrant culture, and picturesque scenery, we invite you to explore and experience all that our charming city has to offer. Enjoy your stay and make unforgettable memories!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Washington Dulles International Airport houses the majority of the airport's amenities and services, including check-in counters, baggage claim, and dining options.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A at Washington Dulles International Airport primarily serves domestic flights and is home to several airlines, including United Airlines and American Airlines.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B at Washington Dulles International Airport primarily serves international flights and is home to several airlines, including Lufthansa and Air France.

terminals.name: Concourse C
terminals.description: Concourse C at Washington Dulles International Airport primarily serves domestic and international flights and is home to several airlines, including Delta Air Lines and JetBlue.

wifi.note: Passengers can access the airport's free wifi network by selecting 'FlyDulles' from the list of available networks.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Ronald Reagan Washington National Airport handles all domestic flights and a few international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: Terminal A at Ronald Reagan Washington National Airport is used for all American Airlines and American Eagle flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B/C
terminals.description: Terminal B/C at Ronald Reagan Washington National Airport is used for all Alaska Airlines, Delta Air Lines, JetBlue, and United Airlines flights.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Potomac Airfield Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Montgomery County Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
